pm_kisan.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
pm_kisan.benefit: ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments

pmfby.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
pmfby.eligibility: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers

pkvy.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
pkvy.eligibility: Farmers in groups of 50 covering 50 hectares

kcc.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
kcc.benefit: Credit limit based on cropping pattern and scale of finance

soil_health_card.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
soil_health_card.benefit: Free soil testing and customized fertilizer recommendations

per_drop_more_crop.name: Per Drop More Crop (Micro Irrigation)
per_drop_more_crop.description: Water use efficiency through micro irrigation
per_drop_more_crop.subsidy: 55% for small/marginal farmers, 45% for other farmers
per_drop_more_crop.coverage: Drip irrigation, sprinkler irrigation, rain guns
